newsitem.title: USA: Comdisco, Asset Software in alliance.
newsitem.headline: Comdisco, Asset Software in alliance.

text.p: Comdisco Inc and Asset Software International Corp said Monday they entered into an agreement to provide cooperatively asset management software and services worldwide.

Under the agreement, the companies said they will develop a common data exchange interface for Comdisco's CLASS and Asset Software's AssetPRO products. This will allow customers to take advantage of both products.
The companies said they also will coordinate future development of their products.
Comdisco also will be an authorized worldwide distributor of Asset Software's full suite of asset management software, including AssetPRO, AssetREQUEST and AssetRADAR.
Comdisco is a technology services company that addresses asset management, equipment leasing and remarketing, business continuity, technology integration and network services.
Asset Software, based in Ottawa, Canada, provides asset management solutions.
